title: 'How can you defend suspected paedophiles?' - top lawyer threatened
text:
Cape Town - Defence attorney William Booth says he has received anonymous threats for his defence of two men accused of sexual offences against minors, but will not turn his back on his clients.
Up to five letters per day have been delivered to his home and office and he has also received SMSes, he told News24 on Monday.
“It is intimidatory and complete harassment,” Booth said.
In his 25 years as a lawyer, he has never received such personal threats, he continued.
